== Introduction == 

Fabric ([http://www.fabfiles.org http://www.fabfiles.org ]) is a python deployment tool to automate builds.

== Setup == 

You need to have at least python 2.5 installed in your system

First install subversion,python-dev headers and setuptools

{{{
sudo apt-get install subversion python-dev python-setuptools
}}}

Now easy_install fabric

{{{
sudo easy_install fabric
}}}
